overview:
Eduardo is specialized in digital marketing and product development.

For the past 12 years he has developed projects throughout Brazil, Latin America and the Emerging Markets (including India and SE Asia) based on the internet and digital platforms.

His experience includes leading roles for companies or projects involved in e-commerce, e-learning, digital content and online marketing planning and media buying.

Eduardo has developed his career both in start-ups and multi-national companies such as Parlo.com, Yahoo!, SKY and DIRECTV. Currently he is the Country Manager of Batanga Media in Brazil.
